title: any info on the yoric rework?
body: i need some info if there is please tell me

replies.body:
Soon â„¢

The only info is:
"yes we know he needs a rework, we just have no idea what we want to do with him. Maybe a Juggernaut? His rework ideas from 2013 were shelved"
"Yorick will be looked at more closely after Taric is finished"
I'd say it's gonna be a full Sion style rework. They'll preserve his ultimate if we're lucky.
That's what I'm hoping for. Just a totally different concept, only the name being the same, and maybe his ultimate too
